Articles.Content:
In the VAB/SPH when you use a heatshield, it adds some kind of side panels, but after i save a reload a game, these parts are missing, see image

![yBfA90O.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/yBfA90O.jpg)

The ship is still together, but graphically the part is missing.

This happens 100% of the time.

Anyone else have the same?
It happens. I also believe that reloading the game will remove the remnants of detached struts and decouplers.
This is one of those bugs that SHOULD have been picked up during testing. I still can't believe it slipped through the cracks.
